## Description {#details}

Data structure describing the variable locations in a function.

Used as the result of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assignmenttrackinganalysis">AssignmentTrackingAnalysis</a> pass. Essentially read-only outside of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assignmenttrackinganalysis">AssignmentTrackingAnalysis</a> where it is built.

Definition at line 38 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/assignmenttrackinganalysis-h">AssignmentTrackingAnalysis.h</a>.

## Private Member Attributes

### SingleVarLocEnd {#ac3d4345aafddc924fa9b77466fb95df4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::FunctionVarLocs::SingleVarLocEnd = 0">
End of range of VarLocRecords that represent variables with a single location that is valid for the entire scope.

Range starts at 0.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/assignmenttrackinganalysis-h/#l00047">47</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/assignmenttrackinganalysis-h">AssignmentTrackingAnalysis.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Variables {#a7df06c821743c0e4bffb8a91a11f7831}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallVector&lt;DebugVariable&gt; llvm::FunctionVarLocs::Variables</>}>
Maps <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/varlocinfo/#af70494f348808c889f07f71f43cd28ec">VarLocInfo.VariableID</a> to a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugvariable">DebugVariable</a> for VarLocRecords.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/assignmenttrackinganalysis-h/#l00040">40</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/assignmenttrackinganalysis-h">AssignmentTrackingAnalysis.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### VarLocRecords {#ac5abfaf923648478c4c25d6c2ca7e452}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallVector&lt;VarLocInfo&gt; llvm::FunctionVarLocs::VarLocRecords</>}>
List of variable location changes grouped by the instruction the change occurs before (see VarLocsBeforeInst).

The elements from zero to SingleVarLocEnd represent variables with a single location.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/assignmenttrackinganalysis-h/#l00044">44</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/assignmenttrackinganalysis-h">AssignmentTrackingAnalysis.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DenseMap&lt;const Instruction &#42;, std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; &gt; llvm::FunctionVarLocs::VarLocsBeforeInst</>}>
Maps an instruction to a range of VarLocs that start just before it.
